name: Lethal RPG: War
description: Journey on an epic quest with Lethal and his elite party of warriors through a huge fantasy land. Play as Lethal and his companions in exciting turn based battles against a variety of fantasy creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or greater Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game, despite it's appearance and relative 'cheapness,' is actually very well done and fun. It's more entertaining than some AAA games and simple to enjoy. I highly recommend this game for anyone who's just looking to kill some time. Although the story is a little contrived, it's still enjoyable. The gameplay itself is easy to master and fun to mess around with. The added bonus of being able to just sit in an area and 'farm xp' makes this a lot easier than just rushing through the story.
i really liked this game,when Lethal RPG: War 2? :)
- Very nice graphic. - Fun gameplay. I recommend this game and hope the dev bring us the sequel!

I heartily recommend this game. It is easy to learn and simple to play, but very deep in figuring out the logic of the combat. It is fun upgrading your trrops and following the plot. For the price it can't be beat.

This is an excellent throwback turn-based RPG with a good storyline. The undead are taking over and as the king's right-hand man you are tasked with making things right again. You'll meet many people along the way and recruit several of them to join you in your mission. I've had a lot of fun saving the world from necromancy.  Pros:  Turn-based RPG goodness with fun cartoonish graphics   Upgradable weapons and armor via earned items from battle   Several characters available (once unlocked) to allow various combos and play styles   Dialogue that is amusing (at times) amongst the characters   Cons:  Can only have 3 active party members   Grinding may be required (though I'm not sure this is actually a con since it's a turn-based RPG)   Battles are often heavily influenced by you having the right element equipped   For the money it's absolutely worth the purchase, though I wish it was a longer game.
Simple, interesting, fun! I can just recommend this game! Price is worth it!  81/100
Cheap and fun game. A lot like DragonFable. I don't usually like the cheap games I buy on steam but I have definitely enjoyed this one!

To be completely honest, this game is far better than I expected and I am truly enjoying my time playing it. I truly do suggest this game for those who are interested in turn based RPGs. The fact that you are at full health and your dead characters are revived after each round is just truly nice to have for once.   Yeah....I suggest getting this game and I sorta feel bad for being able to get it in a bundle but I would gladly have bought it if it wasn't knowing how it plays is all.

It's a fun little game to waste time with. Enjoying it so far at least, but there are like two things that I wish it had, which are; keyboard controls(everything is done with the mouse) and an auto battle button. Both of these things are minor, but it would make the game less tedious at grindy moments.
